name: Piercing
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Lethal
description: The crew suffers the structural damage minus ship size. Personal armor does not help, only protection against radiation is effective.

name: Point defense
description: Reduces weapon range to short but grants an advantage when trying to shoot down incoming rockets or fighters.

name: Deadly
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Massive
description: Increases speed, energy consumption and damage of the weapon by 2.

name: Fast
description: Reduces the weapons speed by one. Can't be combined with massive.
